input_email_body:
Subject: Request for Security Assistance

Our organization has encountered unauthorized access to medical data systems, which might be due to outdated security measures You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.. After updating firewalls and reviewing access logs, the problem still exists My name is Jane Smith.. We need help to resolve this issue.
